title: "The power of science": HPV vaccine proven to dramatically reduce cervical cancer - Cancer Research UK - Cancer News
author: Lilly Matson
description: New results find that the HPV vaccine was shown to dramatically reduce cervical cancer rates by 90% in women in their 20s who were offered it at age 12 to 13.
cleaned_text: vaccine proven to dramatically reduce cervical cancer - Cancer Research UK - Cancer News
